commit message:
CustomMediaPlayer: flush codec on seek

Request the flush in the seek thread, but actually execute it at the appropriate
point in the decode thread. This prevents corrupted playback right after seeking.

fixes #195
Replace deprecated remotecontrolclient with mediasessioncopmat which is functional as of revision 22 of support library
